item.description:
After the success of Drupal Camp 2013 it was suggester that we start doing monthly DUG's again. They will be rotating in location through the Drupal shops in the area, from greenfield to Amherst to Northampton.

The Agenda for first meeting will be discussion of DrupalCampMA - what we learned, etc.

If anyone want to add to the agenda, please do so via the comments.

Pizza will be provided. Please signup so we get a good idea of head count.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Drupal Meetup
